name: ThemeRegion Companion
author: ThemeRegion

sections.description:
This plugin comes with all the core libraries of themeregion themes. Like metabox framework, theme framework & other features like widgets etc are included within this plugin. Its not for regular usage as it’s meant to be used by only themeregion’s themes.

Credits

The icon used for the banner & icon is from flaticon library Flaticon
sections.installation:
1. Upload themeregion-companion.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
If this plugin can be used with other themes?

No this plugin is meant to be used with only themeregion’s theme.

What does this plugin includes?

This plugin comes with all the core libraries of themeregion themes. Like metabox framework, theme framework & other features like widgets etc are included within this plugin
